meanings.definition: Serving as an explanation or addition to clarify a preceding word or phrase.
meanings.sent1: The epexegetic note at the end of the document provided further details.
meanings.sent2: Her epexegetic comments helped the students understand the complex topic.
meanings.sent3: The epexegetic explanation was so clear that even the youngest child could follow along.
meanings.sent4: His epexegetic gestures during the presentation were like a spotlight on the main points.
meanings.sent5: The epexegetic examples in the textbook made the concept crystal clear.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to an epexegeis.
meanings.sent1: The epexegetic analysis shed light on the ancient text's meaning.
meanings.sent2: She presented an epexegetic study that connected various historical events.
meanings.sent3: The epexegetic reference in the book made the readers chuckle at its cleverness.
meanings.sent4: His epexegetic approach to storytelling was like painting with words.
meanings.sent5: The epexegetic comparison brought a new perspective to the research findings.
